body_html:
I think using partial_run, or perhaps saving your subgraph output state in a variable to be consumed downstream is probably the best ways to go about doing this for now.

Note that partial_run is also supported at the C++ interface, though I'd like to see proof that it would be 'superior'. :)

body:
I think using partial_run, or perhaps saving your subgraph output state in a variable to be consumed downstream is probably the best ways to go about doing this for now.

Note that partial_run is also supported at the C++ interface, though I'd like to see proof that it would be 'superior'. :)
